Entries.default:
After an arduous journey, you finally reach the center of the volcanic devastation. Before you is a broad-faced stone building rugged with age.

The eye of Wael, solitary and all-seeing, is emblazoned above the door.

You approach the door. Though clearly made only of stone, you feel the burn of the eye's regard between your eyes.

The door swings open without a sound and reveals a dark, narrow staircase winding down into the earth.
The door swings open at your approach, almost as if it anticipated your return.
